revised_title: A Comparison of a Dwarf's Dimensions with Those of a Child under Four Years Old
tldr: This article presents a comparison of the dimensions and weight of a dwarf named John Coan with those of a three-year-old child. The dwarf, who stands at 38 inches tall and weighs 34 pounds, is compared to the child, who is 37.7 inches tall and weighs 36 pounds. The article highlights the differences in their body measurements and provides insight into the real smallness of the dwarf.
